title: Mike and Ike logo w/ tiny serifs
content:
Anyone have an idea on what typeface is used in the mike and ike logo? Looks a like a more rounded and friedly Bodoni. Here is a link to the site with the logo below

[http://www.mikeandike.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121025414/http:/www.mikeandike.com/ "http://www.mikeandike.com/")

Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mikeandike.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121025414/http:/typophile.com/files/mikeandike.jpg) | 24.61 KB |

 [‹ (x) Similar to Beaumarchais - Columbus (Beaumarchais, Deneane) {Yves, Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121025414/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33604 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Dyson and BMI logos - custom designed {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121025414/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33515 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marketplicity

comments.content: I don’t think this is bodoniesque at all. Rather a hybrid face (so categorized by Berthold). It’s probably custom. Closest I could think of is Daily News by Berthold. ITC Symbol might be close, too.
